channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Hypervisor Introspection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Hypervisor Introspection

item.title: CVE-2020-15293|2024-09-17T03:33:44.369Z -- bitdefender -- hypervisor%20introspection
item.description: Memory corruption in IntLixCrashDumpDmesg, IntLixTaskFetchCmdLine, IntLixFileReadDentry and IntLixFileGetPath due to insufficient guest-data input validation may lead to denial of service conditions.
